metadata.title: CVE-2024-39465 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: mgb4: Fix double debugfs removeFixes an error where debugfs_remove_recursive() is called first on a parentdirectory and then again on a child which causes a kernel panic.[hverkuil: added Fixes/Cc tags]

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
